node.title: Corpus Christi Project
node.author: Tom Nurkkala
node.subtitle: Internationalized Church Management
node.content:
Corpus Christi (CC) is an open-source, internationalized church management suite.

Developed under the auspices of the Center for Missions Computing at Taylor University.

node.title: Dream Suite
node.author: Tom Nurkkala
node.subtitle: Stop Trafficking
node.content: Protect the most vulnerable, see their value, and recognize their worth.
